attributes.action: Change the education system for children on the spectrum
attributes.additional_details: I belove that the mental health of young people today is declining due to the education system, and the lack of support for undiagnosed children. Their is only one way to teach, and children learn in so many different ways.
attributes.background: Change the education system. Allowing different ways to teach, educate, so that young people on the spectrum are not suffering, and having a bad education, or miss school.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you want the government to change the education system for children on the spectrum, but we’re not sure exactly what you'd like to be changed.

You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Require more qualifications for teachers/teaching assistants at SEN schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700700

Review state education and students’ wellbeing, especially for children with SEN
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703964

Fund more training for teachers on neurodivergence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708958

Make autism training mandatory for teachers in schools to help understanding
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702034
